title: The development of OA as per the requirements of MCGM shall be permissible as per these Regulations
clause_text: The development of OA as per the requirements of MCGM shall be permissible as per these Regulations. Provided further that Municipal Commissioner’s decision regarding development of OA shall be final & binding.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The development of OA as per the requirements of MCGM shall be permissible as per these Regulations. Provided further that Municipal Commissioner’s decision regarding development of OA shall be final
